snippet: The International Monetary Fund’s board approved the loan package on Wednesday to help the nation revive its ailing economy.
abstract: International Monetary Fund’s board approves $6.7 billion loan package for Pakistan to help nation revive its ailing economy.
lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund’s board approved the loan package on Wednesday to help the nation revive its ailing economy.

headline.main: I.M.F. Approves $6.7 Billion Loan for Pakistan
headline.print_headline: I.M.F. Approves Loan Of $6.7 Billion for Pakistan
